title: Sensus x Emil Johansson drop EM.J signature grip for slopestyle confidence
content:
Cam Zink’s Sensus brand have partnered with 21 year old Emil Johansson to develop his very own dream handlebar grip; the EM.J Signature Grip. As the direct point of contact with the bike, Emil considers grips to be one of the most important components of a bike. No surprise then that this Red Bull freerider […]

The post Sensus x Emil Johansson drop EM.J signature grip for slopestyle confidence appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
